command.value:
/*================================================
 Program: cew_trade.do
 Author:  Avi Ebenstein
 Created: June 2008
 Purpose: Take in the raw CEW data and
          merge with the trade data
=================================================*/

value: * Prepare the 4-digit SIC crosswalk for manufacturing from NBER data  ;
* Keep the sic87 which receives the largest share from sic72 ;

varlist.value: "SIC72 -> SIC87 (when you have sic72, this gives you sic87)"

value: * Take data from 1975-2000, and convert from SIC72 -> SIC87 (year<=1986) ;
/* Only merge the observations prior to switch */
* Use the CEW data to weight the trade up to the 1987 SIC ;
* Aggregate these up to a 3-digit SIC (not used)     ;

varlist.value: "Trade variables and CEW data at 3-digit SIC87"

value: * Put these in the units of man7090 (taken from autor);
* Assemble trade data at alternative weights ;
* Track wage bill and # of 4-digit SIC codes ;

varlist.value: "Low Wage Country Import Value Share at 1979 weights"
"Low Wage Country Import Number Share at 1979 weights"
"Total real capital stock in $1m at 1979 weights (nber)"

value: * Special fix for incomplete trade series data - not currently doing this!!! ;
